parameters.name: SCPOT
parameters.description: Spacecraft potential with respect to plasma. Median value over 10 s interval.

parameters.name: SCPOTSTD
parameters.description: Std. deviation of the s/c potential with respect to plasma over 10 s interval.

parameters.name: PSP
parameters.description: Average probe-to-spacecraft potential. Median over 10 s interval.

parameters.name: PSPSTD
parameters.description: Std. deviation of the average probe-to-spacecraft potential over 10 s interval.
